    • Method Detail

      • searchValue

        public double searchValue(SearchNode node,
                 Board board,
                 int move)
        Description copied from class: MctsPlayer
        Returns the UCT upper bound for node. This is the UCB1-TUNED policy, explained in the tech report by Gelly, et al, "Modification of UCT with Patterns in Monte-Carlo Go". The formula is at the bottom of p. 5 in that paper.
        Overrides:
        searchValue in class RavePlayer
